about_the_game:
Project Survivor Discord


Survive Constantly Pouring Monsters for 15 minutes!

Unique Gameplay and Gimmicks
It is a 2D-Platformer Rogue-lite Survival game.
Upgrade and purchase various weapons to hunt more and more monsters.
Dodge monsters in an infinite horizontal space, set up a floor and take your place.
You can adjust the difficulty of the game by moving it left or right.

Various Weapon Upgrades
Hunt monsters and earn coins to upgrade your weapons.
The more expensive the upgrade, the stronger it will be.
Depending on which upgrade you choose, you can play strategically.


Various Jobs

You can play with 4 classes: Warrior (Melee), Archer (Ranged), Mage (Magic), Kumiho (Mage).
Even with the same difficulty, depending on the job,
even with the same job, depending on the choice of weapons and upgrades
You can play differently.


Various Weapon Upgrades

Hunt monsters and earn coins to upgrade your weapons.
The more expensive the upgrade, the stronger it will be.
Depending on which upgrade you choose, you can play strategically.


Passive Shop For Clearing The Game

Coins earned in the game can be used to purchase permanent passives in the shop.
If the game is difficult, you can use the passive shop to become stronger.


Two Different Modes

The platformer mode is a mode made to suit the development intention.
You will play as a side-scrolling platformer, and it is a fairly difficult mode.
Endless mode increases understanding of the game before going to platformer mode
This is a mode where you can earn coins to purchase various passives.


Retro Style CRT Filter

A CRT filter using a scan line was used to connect to a TV at home to play.
It reminds me of nostalgia and enjoyment of the game.


Features in Demo Ver.
You can Pre-Play the demo version in Steam.
Can Play Range character.
Upgrade 3 Weapons & 2 Passives.
Defeat 2 Boss Monster Stages.

About Project Survivor
More Characters!
More Weapons & Passives!
More Boss Stages.

Project Survivor Discord


Survive Constantly Pouring Monsters for 15 minutes!

Unique Gameplay and Gimmicks
It is a 2D-Platformer Rogue-lite Survival game.
Upgrade and purchase various weapons to hunt more and more monsters.
Dodge monsters in an infinite horizontal space, set up a floor and take your place.
You can adjust the difficulty of the game by moving it left or right.

The more expensive the upgrade, the stronger it will be.
Depending on which upgrade you choose, you can play strategically.

You can play with 4 classes: Warrior (Melee), Archer (Ranged), Mage (Magic), Kumiho (Mage).
Even with the same difficulty, depending on the job,
even with the same job, depending on the choice of weapons and upgrades
You can play differently.


Various Weapon Upgrades

Hunt monsters and earn coins to upgrade your weapons.
The more expensive the upgrade, the stronger it will be.

name: Project Survivor

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 or Later
  • Processor: 64-Bit Processor
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1GB
  • Storage: 100 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 7 or Later
  • Processor: 64-Bit Processor
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 2GB
  • Storage: 100 MB available space

short_description: A retro style game that can be played in 2D platformer mode and top-down mode. Hunt monsters, collect coins, and buy weapons to become stronger. Play with 3-classes and a variety of weapons. Enjoy cute retro style pixel art that you see on a nostalgic CRT monitor filter.
